oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Technology in the veterinary workplace
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rooker, Eric J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: technology
marketing
excel
thermal audit
necropsy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Grace Hopper said that the most dangerous phrase in our modern language is, “We’ve always done it this way.” Her statement is truer today than ever. In an age of rapidly evolving technology and innovation, we as veterinary medical professionals must strive to keep up and continue innovating if we wish to remain relevant in the highly competitive food animal consultant industry. This means that veterinarians need to provide clients with new cutting-edge services that will ultimately improve the quality of life for their operation’s animals and provide positive economic returns.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2019; 219-226
